I would give this movie more stars, but the last 20 minutes or so just plummets into mediocrity. If you can endure this, you'll see the movie has some very interesting messages about communication and love. The movie is about a girl who speaks in sign language and the man she falls in love with who can't understand her language. The first half of the movie is about how the two communicate with each other and how they slowly figure each other out.
